title: Game freezes and crashes when entering a match
body: Recently i updated windows 10 on August 20th 2016 which gave a new look on the welcome page but every time i enter a game, the game freezes and i am forced to hold down the power button to shut down my laptop forcefully, any reasons why ?

replies.body: Yeah i tried reverting my updates and it worked guys, it happened to my friend but he couldnt revert the updates cause his update happened more than 10 days so we're trying removing the xbox game bar method

I had a feeling I was going to recognize this issue as soon as I saw you updated Windows 10.  Some players have been experiencing this freeze with the recent update, and it turns out that the culprit might be the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) interacting poorly with League.  Disabling it per the link should get you fixed up.  Hope that helps!

I had the same problem. I found a fix from an old YouTube video. I'm assuming you can run the client so that's not a problem. If your game is crashing in game it might be because you're using a Logitech device like a mouse or keyboard. If you are try doing this. Go to League of Legends > RADS > solutions > lol game client > releases > the next folder (0.0.1 something) > deploy. In this folder you can find some Logitech files, the video recommended deleting them, but I just renamed them by adding an f at the end of the file before the .dll (it still worked). This worked for me and I hope it works for you.

No clue, but on another post somebody suggested reverting the update.

It worked for them, maybe you should try it.
